name: ArcBest Corporation
description: ArcBest Corporation is a leading logistics company that provides a wide range of transportation and logistics solutions. Founded in 1923, ArcBest has evolved from a traditional freight carrier to a diversified logistics provider, focusing on supply chain optimization and innovative solutions. The company operates through several subsidiaries, including ABF Freight, which is one of the largest less-than-truckload (LTL) carriers in North America. ArcBest offers services such as freight transportation, logistics management, and technology-driven solutions, catering to various industries including retail, manufacturing, and e-commerce. The company is dedicated to leveraging advanced technology and data analytics to improve efficiency, enhance customer experience, and provide tailored logistics services. With a commitment to sustainability, ArcBest strives to minimize its environmental impact through various initiatives, including optimizing transportation routes and investing in fuel-efficient technologies. Its mission is to deliver exceptional service while continuously innovating and adapting to meet the evolving needs of its customers in an increasingly complex logistics landscape.

faq.question: What services does ArcBest offer?
faq.answer: ArcBest offers a range of services including less-than-truckload (LTL), truckload, expedited freight, and supply chain management solutions.

faq.question: Where is ArcBest headquartered?
faq.answer: ArcBest is headquartered in Fort Smith, Arkansas, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of ArcBest?
faq.answer: J. B. Hunt is the CEO of ArcBest Corporation.
